commenter_b: Well, it's not final yet, but research has shown that kids in 3rd world countries have fewer food allergies because they have had hookworm infections. The hookworm releases enzymes that actully turn off parts of your dna that determine food allergies and other autoimmune diseases. It's in the worm's best interest to keep the host able to eat many things so that the worm can enjoy them, too.
